data.name: Horny Sekai - DLC 18+ Adult Only
data.detailed_description: Did you want to see the girs from "Horny sekai" naked or do something more, than a kiss? This DLC will allow you that

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This dlc contains nudity and sex scenes
All characters are over 18 years old
